Translations.Text: higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
adaralli (bhumiyalli) iruva ellavu nasavagalide
mattu vaibhavapurna hagu man'yanada nim'ma odeyanu matra uliyuvanu
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
akasagalalli hagu bhumiyalliruva pratiyobbaru avanodaneye beduttare. Avanu nityavu sakriyanagiruttane
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella anugrahagalannu allagaleyuviri
eradu bharagale (manavare hagu jinn‌gale), bahu begane navu nim'matta gamana harisaliddeve
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
jinn‌gale mattu manavare, akasagala hagu bhumiya gadigalannu miri hogalu nimage sadhyaviddare miri hogiri. (Allahana) adesavillade miri hogalu nimage sadhyavagadu
higirutta, nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu nivu allagaleyuviri
nim'ma mele benkiya jvaleyannu hagu hogeyannu eragisalaguvudu mattu (avugalannu) edurisalu nimage sadhyavagadu
Higirutta, nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu nivu allagaleyuviri
mattu akasavu biridu biduvaga, adu benda carmadante kempagi biduvudu
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
a dina yava manavanodaneyu yava jinninodaneyu avana papagala kuritu prasnisalaguvudu
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
(andu) aparadhigalu tam'ma mukhagalindale gurutisalpaduvaru mattu avarannu (eledoyyalu) avara hane hagu kalugalindale hidiyalaguvudu
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
iduve, aparadhigalu allagaleyuttidda naraka
(andu) avaru adara (narakagniya) hagu kudiyuva nirina naduve aledaduttiruvaru
